rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hmm? Who's that?
Looks like an alien, but[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0002
rows.name: This is Lu-san, who we met in Nightglow Forest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0003
rows.name:
My designation is Lu Cirufe.
I am one who has lived on this planet since ancient times.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0004
rows.name: Oh? A longtime resident?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0005
rows.name:
That's why we brought him back.
The information we can get from him is valuable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0006
rows.name: I'd like to allow him to reside in NLA, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0007
rows.name:
As Director General, I cannot lightly
accept a foreign element.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0008
rows.name: He is trustworthy[ST:wide ]― That's what I felt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0009
rows.name: No bad people among natives, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Tatsu-kun aside, Elma,
if you say so, then it must be so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Alright, understood.
I will also take responsibility.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0011_2
rows.name: Is that alright then, Your Excellency, Director General?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0012
rows.name: If you two insist so much...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0013
rows.name:
Ohh, thank you so much!
This is what the saying calls "birds of a feather flock together!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0014
rows.name:
Let's drop the formalities.
Please, call me Lu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0015
rows.name: That way I'm more at ease, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Then, Colonel Elma,
tell me your report about the Life Point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0017
rows.name: I see— so it wasn't the primary target after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0018
rows.name:
We found
one of the Database Units.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0019
rows.name: Unit Number: 07.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0020
rows.name:
07, huh[ST:wide ]―
That's the unit with the LC archives, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0021
rows.name: That's one-third of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0022
rows.name: LC[ST:wide ]― The Library of Congress archives[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0023
rows.name:
was supposed to be divided and recorded
on Units 07 to 09.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0024
rows.name:
Well, lucky in a way.
At least what was destroyed wasn't the main one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0025
rows.name: I wonder about that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0026
rows.name: Hm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0027
rows.name:
It's a database containing books and such published
since the start of recorded history.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0028
rows.name:
Books where the progress of humanity and
the history of human hearts are recorded.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Isn't it an irreplaceable cultural heritage that Earthlings
should be proud of?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0030
rows.name: No, that's[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0031
rows.name:
While not everything is gone,
some of it has been lost forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0032
rows.name: This is a grave loss, the death of culture.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0033
rows.name: Mm, mm[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0034
rows.name: NLA has its own database, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0035
rows.name:
If we know the Unit Number,
restoration might be possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0036
rows.name: I hope so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0037
rows.name: More importantly[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0038
rows.name:
That hostile alien group called Growth,
are you certain it's them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0039
rows.name: Yes, take a look at this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0040
rows.name:
It's the same type of mech
that fought over Beijing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0041
rows.name:
In other words, the aliens who attacked Earth
are also on this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0042
rows.name:
Lu and Tatsu both said
they aren't natives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0043
rows.name: They haven't been on this planet long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0044
rows.name:
Did they follow us here,
or is it just a coincidence?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0045
rows.name:
Judging by the fact that they were intentionally
destroying the Life Point,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0046
rows.name:
their approach to Earthlings
can be described as proactive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0047
rows.name: Do they also know the purpose of the Life Point and are searching for it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0048
rows.name:
Maybe the whole reason we haven't found the Core yet
is because they already destroyed it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0049
rows.name:
If that's the case,
we wouldn't even be having this conversation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0050
rows.name: Well, yeah, that's true[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0051
rows.name: Unofficially, there have been other cases, too[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0052
rows.name:
We've also gotten reports of Pathfinder teams
making contact with aliens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0053
rows.name: Not all of them are necessarily Growth, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0054
rows.name:
We should probably keep our defenses
strong more than ever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0055
rows.name:
Good work, Elma.
Please continue searching for the Life Point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0056
rows.name: Understood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0057
rows.name: We don't have much time left.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG0058
rows.name:
We need to find that unit
as soon as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04120100_MSG9000
rows.name: [ST:wide ]― BLADE Command Room [ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]
